sentences.en: Fur business says: " Ah, vulpine essence is really fierce, make It'scarf still can change. "
sentences.cn: 皮货商说: “ 啊, 狐狸精真厉害, 做成了围巾还能变化呢. ”

sentences.en: She disliked his sly ways, but granted him certain vulpine intelligence.
sentences.cn: 她厌恶他狡猾的行事，但承认他的机智。

sentences.en: Sometimes one came near to my window, attracted by my light, barked a vulpine curse at me, and then retreated.
sentences.cn: 有时候，一只狐狸被我的灯光吸引住，走近了我的窗于，吠叫似地向我发出一声狐狸的诅咒，然后急速退走。
